About.p: Hi there! I'm Isabella Terano, a Front-End Web Developer and UX Designer based in Brazil. When I'm not writing code, you can often find me immersed in the world of horror films. Yes, I'm that person who eagerly anticipates every jump scare and plot twist! I'm always curious to learn more, when it comes to explore new technologies and design. My focus is on empowering users through intuitive design, accessibility, and optimizing performance for a seamless browsing experience.

Contact.psecond: or through this form. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
